SEARCH
Package beans.services

Class AuthService

java.lang.Object
beans.services.AuthService
@ApplicationScoped public class AuthService extends Object
AuthService provides authentication-related services such as login, email verification, password reset, and two-factor authentication.
Author:
Davide Scaccia - xscaccd00

    • verifyEmail

      public boolean verifyEmail(String token)
      Verifies a user's email using a token.
      Parameters:
      token - the verification token
      Returns:
      true if the email is successfully verified, false otherwise

    • login

      public boolean login(String email, String password, String twoFactorCode)
      Attempts to log in a user with email, password, and two-factor authentication code.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email
      password - the user's password
      twoFactorCode - the two-factor authentication code
      Returns:
      true if login is successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SecurityException - if the account is locked or email is not verified
      NumberFormatException - if the two-factor code is not a number

    • findUserByEmail

      public User findUserByEmail(String email)

      Parameters:
      email - the user's email
      Returns:
      the User object if found, null otherwise

    • verify2FA

      public boolean verify2FA(User user, String code)
      Verifies a user's two-factor authentication code.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to verify
      code - the two-factor authentication code
      Returns:
      true if the code is valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if the two-factor code is not a number

    • send2FACodeEmail

      public void send2FACodeEmail(String email, String code) throws Exception
      Sends a 2FA code to the specified email address.
      Parameters:
      email - the recipient's email address
      code - the 2FA code to be included in the email
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs while sending the email

    • resetPassword

      public boolean resetPassword(String token, String newPassword) throws Exception
      Resets a user's password using a token and a new password.
      Parameters:
      token - the reset token
      newPassword - the new password
      Returns:
      true if the password is successfully reset, false otherwise
      Throws:
      Exception - if the password is not valid or the token is expired
